name: FukuStalker 1: Sakura in Fukushima
description:
Stalker but in Fukushima. Shooter but actually - adventure.

Features:

  • PDAdroid. You have internet access in your in-game PDA
  • Real Japanese zone. You can see nuclear station
  • Good graphics
  • Athmosphere. Pure Japanese nature and radiation

ATTENTION:

Project`s plot is finished, you can walkthrough the game, but world is not enough detalized. (my PC cannot handle the scene! I need a new PC...)

That`s why the game is no longer developing. But it`s playable!

I am 5410dev, I am creating fully free games for Windows and Android. No ads, no spying.
